channel.title: BlueScape webclient template - [aries]
channel.description:
[center]Hello and welcome i was board so i made a template. i named it bluescape. Any flame/Trolls/Noobs well be Reported+ignored+dereped i make templates to help people out not to get flamed as always enjoy. Credits: 50% - black birds0/Aries [Removed half of it and just used as a base] 50% templatemo [used for base]
download: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/81583746/bluescape.zip
Media: [img]http://img38.imageshack.us/img38/9647/6d0a94964c1d481a83a3d96.png[/img][/center]

item.title: BlueScape webclient template - [aries]
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“black birds0, post:4, topic:457841”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=560766.msg4092696#msg4092696 date=1346539707]
Ive seen you make a lot of these web client templates and all I ever really see you doing is editing a template, removing the content and adding in an applet tag. Expand to bigger and better things, maybe even some scripting languages, PHP for example.

It is nice to see other releases in here though.
[/quote]

I know php and JavaScripting but why would i realse my scripts? Id rather realse Webclient templates to get more downloads plus there’s a reason why im realsing templates only no1 knows though :|[/quote]

Why wouldn’t you release your scripts? What does it benefit you of keeping them to yourself? Most of your web client templates that I have seen are you just cleaning code from an already made template then adding a few bits here and there, I mean come on, post something new instead of several updated versions which is more or less what you’re doing.

Also, if you know PHP why not do a web client page that loads all types of web clients for several revisions? Add in a config.php with

$base = "delta";

Then

[code=php]
require(‘config.php’);

If($base == delta) {
// delta web client code
} else if($base == PI) {
// PI web client code
}[/code]

I apologise for any mistakes in the above code, I wrote it on my iPad and I seriously cannot be fucked reading over it.

Read full topic
